title: Pisces Sexual Compatibility: Most & Least Compatible Signs

steps.title: Virgo.
steps.content: Virgo. Pisces and Virgo complete one another sexually. They're opposites on the zodiac wheel, with Virgo being very down-to-earth and Pisces with their head in the clouds, but together they'll forge a perfect balance. After all, opposites attract! They'll both feel a strong attraction right away, and in bed, they'll have equal passion and dedication to ensuring the other's pleasure. [1] X Research source Virgo, take care to reign in your more critical tendencies in the bedroom. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Sensitive Pisces gets their feelings hurt easily, and it's difficult for them to forgive and forget. Pisces, you may notice that your Virgo starts off shy in bed, but you can see through the walls they put up and help them be more creative during sex.

steps.title: Capricorn.
steps.content: Capricorn. With a Pisces partner, Capricorn can finally relax in the bedroom. They seem very different (and they are), but Capricorn's rigid rationality and Pisces' emotional depth are actually quite compatible. Beneath their stern exterior, Capricorns have a strong sex drive and will appreciate Pisces' creative energy during intimacy. Capricorn, you'll naturally find it easier to let go and enjoy moments of spontaneous pleasure as you get comfortable with your Pisces. At the same time, Pisces, you can learn to be more grounded like Capricorn.

steps.title: Taurus.
steps.content: Taurus. Pisces will share a magical, intimate connection with Taurus. Taurus is more down-to-earth but needs plenty of passion in pleasure and romance—which Pisces can happily provide. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Both signs treat sex as an emotional experience, and Taurus will take the time to make Pisces feel wholly safe and secure. Pisces and Taurus, sex is often exciting for both of you because you focus entirely on your partner's pleasure—both of you will leave the bedroom feeling satisfied.

steps.title: Cancer.
steps.content: Cancer. Pisces and Cancer will love their deeply emotional sex life. Both water signs are driven by emotions and feel that sex and romance should go hand in hand—so their values and sexual preferences are compatible. Each sign will have a lot of respect for the other's sensitivity and needs, making them ideal intimate partners! Cancer, you're more traditional in the bedroom than Pisces, who likes to change things up and be imaginative. Follow Pisces' lead as they help you overcome your inhibitions. Pisces, take it slow and ease Cancer into your wilder fantasies. They're willing to give you what you want but may need time to adjust.

steps.title: Scorpio.
steps.content: Scorpio. Pisces and Scorpio have a ton of passion in the bedroom. They have an innate understanding of one another as water signs, and both feel their emotions very profoundly—which causes sparks to fly when they're together. Scorpio loves to be in charge, but Pisces won't mind following their lead in bed. Scorpio, keep in mind that you're extremely intense and a little rougher in bed than Pisces is used to. Pisces can easily adapt if the emotional connection is there, but you should also learn to check in with your gentler partner. Pisces, work on being more vocal about your boundaries. Scorpio wants you to enjoy yourself, but you may need to speak up to get on the same page.

steps.title: Pisces.
steps.content: Pisces. Two Pisces partners can adapt to one another's sexual needs. As a pair of mutable water signs, they'll understand each other perfectly and have a harmonious sex life. However, that also means they'll run into the same pitfalls. Two Pisces may struggle to speak up about their desires—or even initiate physical intimacy in the first place. As Pisces, you're both likely to be shy initially. You can move forward and enjoy a magical connection in bed if one (or both) of you is more direct and says what you want.

steps.title: Aquarius.
steps.content: Aquarius. Both Pisces and Aquarius are extremely open-minded in bed. Aquarius will love the depth of Pisces' imagination, and Pisces will know just how to make Aquarius' wildest fantasies a reality. Overall they'll enjoy a very satisfying sex life, though they may struggle with an emotional disconnect. Aquarius, your cerebral approach to life can come off as aloof to Pisces. Try to tap into your emotions for a deeper connection in the bedroom. Pisces, try to be patient with Aquarius as they learn to open up to you. It's impossible to rush a stubborn Aquarius, so guide them gently by being your emotional self around them.

steps.title: Libra.
steps.content: Libra. Pisces and Libra connect through Venus, the planet of love. Libra is ruled by Venus, and Venus is exalted through Pisces—which means they can have a sweet and harmonious sex life. They'll both be tender and selfless with one another, as neither is an aggressive sign. However, they may also struggle to get things started because of this. [4] X Research source Libra, you're usually looking for boldness and confidence in the bedroom, which Pisces may not naturally put forward. Give them a little encouragement, and they'll step up. Pisces, consider taking the initiative and openly pursuing Libra. Show a little confidence, and you'll make a great pair in bed. You both love a romantic atmosphere—flowers, candles, and more—and will be able to create an enchanting experience for one another.

steps.title: Sagittarius.
steps.content: Sagittarius. Pisces and Sagittarius will enjoy each other's creativity but may not last. Both are mutable signs, meaning they're flexible and adaptive. They'll each be willing to try new things and have lots of passion in the bedroom, but at the end of the day, Sagittarius is fun-loving, while Pisces is looking for a deep emotional bond during sex. Sagittarius, you need a lot of freedom, and you're always on the move. Meanwhile, Pisces, you’re focused on romance. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Be aware that you may want different things from a sexual relationship.

steps.title: Aries.
steps.content: Aries. Aries may have trouble connecting with Pisces. While Pisces can appreciate Aries' passion and spontaneity, they're also looking for emotional depth that Aries won't instinctively give. Aries is also extremely direct, which can clash with Pisces' sensitivity and make it hard for Pisces to voice their desires in the bedroom. Aries, try to work on your empathy and be sensitive to Pisces' needs. Pisces, gently show Aries how to slow down and savor the moment. If you can adjust to one another, you'll enjoy your time together wholeheartedly.

steps.title: Gemini.
steps.content: Gemini. Pisces and Gemini have different emotional approaches to sex. Gemini has youthful energy, preferring to have fun and keep things casual, while Pisces longs for a deep emotional connection during sex. As such, they may find themselves out of sync in the bedroom. Both of you should talk before jumping into bed. You'll find it much easier to relax and enjoy physical intimacy when you both know what the other wants from the relationship.

steps.title: Leo.
steps.content: Leo. Leo may have a lot of misunderstandings with Pisces in the bedroom. Pisces rarely appreciates Leo's self-centered nature during intimacy. Pisces tends to be a giver, which can leave them feeling unsatisfied if their Leo partner doesn't try to understand their needs. If this pair builds emotional trust first, they'll have a great sex life. Leo can be extremely generous and affectionate when they want to! [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Leo, you can improve your sexual compatibility with Pisces by making an effort to check on them more often during intimacy. Meanwhile, Pisces, you can learn from Leo's bold attitude and be more vocal about what you want in bed.
